BoyGifts.Wish: I wish you and all your family and friends good health.
I wish you to be the strongest boy in the world.
Be gentlemen and all girls will be yours.
I wish you to be the smartest boy in the world.

GirlGifts.Wish: I wish you to find the love of all your life.
I wish you to be the most beautiful girl in the world.
I wish you to succeed in all your deals.
I wish you and all your family and friends good health.
